Posts.EditableText: My signature doesn't show up in posts. Is this normal?
Posts.HTML: My signature doesn't show up in posts. Is this normal?

Posts.EditableText: Mine didn't appear either. I tend to not like them anyway.
Posts.HTML: Mine didn't appear either. I tend to not like them anyway.

Posts.EditableText:
It looks like they may not be enabled. When you go to Edit Signature, the subtext shows...
[quote:35vhhao9]This is a block of text that can be added to posts you make.[color=#BF0000:35vhhao9] There is a 0 character limit.[/color:35vhhao9][/quote:35vhhao9]
(Coloured text highlighted by me.)
Posts.HTML:
It looks like they may not be enabled. When you go to Edit Signature, the subtext shows...

This is a block of text that can be added to posts you make. There is a 0 character limit.


(Coloured text highlighted by me.)
